catalogue_raissonne:
Delteil 24 i/vi (one of two impressions of the 
first state)
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: smudgy, grey image; horizon line with triangular shape and light linear marks and splotches. Not signed Aquatint on heavy wove paper, Delteil i/vi (one of two impressions of the first state (of six)
inscription: LLC, in pencil: LD 24.46 | LRC, in pencil: 100
provenance:
Henri M. Petiet, Paris (oval stamp, verso; Lugt supplement 2021a ); Piasa, Paris (13 June 2002), sold to Boerner; C. G. Boerner, New York until 2008, sold to MIA.

Petiet may have purchased Effet de Pluie from the second or third Pissarro sales at the Drouot auction house in Paris on either December 6, 1928 (lot 31) or April 12, 1929 (lot. 30).
title: Rain Effect
